scripts.md-diff: echo Open md.diff.html to see test output && nodemon ./test/diffMd.js --ext * --ignore *.diff.html
scripts.build-firefox: npm install && npm run dev-firefox && npm run assert-clean && rm -r src && rm -r chrome

scripts.update-chrome: git restore . && git pull && npm run build-chrome
